Umphandle > Ushicilelo > IiNkcukacha Zoluntu > I &gt Iphetshana Elinikezela Inkcazelo Ngempilo Yasemsebenzini

Iphetshana Elinikezela Inkcazelo Ngempilo Yasemsebenzini



2000

Isebe Lemicimbi Yabasebenzi (Ezothutho Nemisebenzi Yoluntu, uRhulumente Wephondo leNtshona Kapa)



ISISHWANKATHELO

Ulwazi olufikeleleka lula kubasebenzi ngemakwenzeke xa kukho umonakalo nokwenzakala emsebenzini.





* Xa ndinokuthi ndenzakale emsebenzini?
* Xa ndinokuthi ndosuleleke sisifo ke?
* Uthini umthetho?
* Iinkcukacha zoqhagamshelwano ezilulutho



XA NDINOKUTHI NDENZAKALE EMSEBENZINI?

Amanqanaba ekufuneka elandelwe:

1. Yazisa umphathi wakho ngoko nangoko (ngembalelwano ukuba unakho, kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo ngaphambi kokuphela kolo suku). Fumana unyango lokuqala ukuba oko kuyimfuneko.


2. Umqeshi kufuneka agcwalise iphetshana elibizwa ngokuba "Yingxeloe Yomqeshi Ngengozi" ze akunike iSiqendu B salo, ekufuneka ulinike ugqirha okunyangayo.


3. Ugqirha okunyangayo kufuneka agcwalise "Ingxelo Yonyango Yokuqala" kwakunye ne-Akhawunti Yonyango.


4. Ukuba ukwenzakala kwakho kunobuzaza kakhulu futhi kuthabatha ixesha elide ukuphila, ugqirha wakho kufuneka agcwalise "Ingxelo Ngendlela Oluqhuba Unyango" rhoqo ngenyanga.


5. Xa isigulo sakho sichacha kuhle, ugqirha wakho uya kugcwalisa "Ingxelo Yokugqibela Yonyango


6. Umqeshi wakho kufuneka agcwalise "Ingxelo Yokubuyela Emsebenzini" xa ubuyela emsebenzini.





XA NDINOKUTHI NDOSULELEKE SISIFO KE?

Izigulo Zasemsebenzini zingumvuka weemeko umntu asebenza phantsi kwazo emsebenzini. Angamashumi amabini anesibhozo amanqanaba Ezigulo Zasemsebenzini ezaziwayo nguMkomishinala Ojongene Neembuyekezo (kwiCandelo 3).

Amanyathelo Ekufuneka Elandelwe:

1. Umsebenzi wazisa umqeshi.


2. Umqeshi uthumela ingxelo kuMkomishinala.


3. Ugqirha ungenisa iingxelo zonyango (eziquka eyendlela aqhuba ngayo umsebenzi lowo kunyango kwaneyokugqibela).


4. Umqeshi ugcwalisa "Ingxelo Yokubuyela Emsebenzini".





UTHINI WONA UMTHETHO?



UmthethoiOccupational Health and Safety Act, ka-1993 (njengoko ulunga-lungisiwe)
Ujongana Nempilo Nokhuseleko kwiimeko ezininzi zentsebenzo

Uphantsi kolawulo lweSebe Lemicimbi Yabasebenzi

iMines Health and Safety Act, ka-1996
Ujongana Nempilo Nokhuseleko kushishino lwezimbiwa
ze ube phantsi Kolawulo lweSebe Lwezimbiwa Namandla

iCompensation for Occupational Injuries and Diseases Act, -ka-1993
Ujongana neembuyekezo kwiingozi nezigulo kwiindawo ezininzi zempangelo kwanakushishino lezimbiwa
iphantsi Kolawulo lweSebe Lemicimbi Yabasebenzi


I-Occupational Diseases in Mines and Works Act, ka-1973
I-Occupational Diseases in Mines and Works Amendment Act, 60 ka-2002
Ujongana neembuykezo kwizifo ezihlaselwa abasebenzi basemigodini

iphantsi kolawulo lweSebe Lezempilo

iBasic Conditions of Employment Act, 75 ka-997
yona ijongana, phakathi kwezinye, nezona meko zingundoqo ekusetyenzwa phantsi kwazo
Iphantsi kolawulo lweSebe Lemicimbi Yabasebenzi

iLabour Relations Act
Ijongana, phakathi kwezinye izinto, nendlela obumiselwe ngayo ubudlelwane bomqeshi nabasebenzi bakhe
Iphantsi Kolawulo lweSebe Lemicimbi Yabasebenzi
